info.title: Fintrak API
info.description: API for financial tracking and product management

get.summary: Get period summary with expenses and incomes by category
get.description: Fetch all expenses and incomes for a specific time period with totals grouped by category and latest transactions

parameters.name: latestCount
parameters.description: Number of latest transactions to include (default 5)

latestTransactions.description: Latest transactions (expenses and incomes combined) sorted by date

post.summary: Authenticate with Google ID token (for mobile)

idToken.description: Google ID token from mobile app

get.description: Retrieves list of available banks/providers via Tink (filtered by market). Requires user authentication token from Tink OAuth flow.

parameters.name: market
parameters.description: Market code (defaults to ES for Spain)

401.description: User token required (get token from /authorize flow)

post.description: Generate Tink authorization URL for user to connect their bank

redirectUri.description: URL to redirect after bank authentication

get.description: Exchange authorization code for access token
Retrieves user's connected bank accounts from Tink
Retrieves all transactions from all connected accounts
Retrieves transactions for a specific bank account from Tink
Retrieves all categories for the authenticated user

post.description: Creates a new category for the authenticated user

409.description: Category with this ID already exists

get.description: Retrieves a specific category by ID for the authenticated user

put.description: Updates an existing category for the authenticated user

delete.description: Deletes an existing category for the authenticated user

get.description: Search and filter counterparties for the authenticated user
Retrieves a specific counterparty by ID for the authenticated user

put.description: Updates an existing counterparty for the authenticated user

delete.description: Deletes an existing counterparty for the authenticated user

post.description: Creates a new counterparty for the authenticated user

409.description: Counterparty with this ID already exists

get.description: Search and filter expenses for the authenticated user

parameters.name: includeTotal
parameters.description: Whether to include total amount in response

totalAmount.description: Total amount of all matching expenses (only included when includeTotal=true)

get.description: Retrieves a specific expense by ID for the authenticated user

put.description: Updates an existing expense for the authenticated user

delete.description: Deletes an existing expense for the authenticated user

post.description: Creates a new expense for the authenticated user

errors.description: List of errors encountered during import
List of errors encountered during import

400.description: Bad request - no file uploaded or invalid JSON

errors.description: List of errors encountered during import

400.description: Bad request - no file uploaded or invalid JSON

errors.description: List of errors encountered during import

400.description: Bad request - no file uploaded or invalid JSON

post.summary: Import recurring transactions from JSON file

total.description: Total number of recurring transactions processed

imported.description: Number of recurring transactions successfully imported

errors.description: List of errors encountered during import

400.description: Bad request - no file uploaded or invalid JSON

get.description: Search and filter incomes for the authenticated user

parameters.name: includeTotal
parameters.description: Whether to include total amount in response

totalAmount.description: Total amount of all matching incomes (only included when includeTotal=true)

get.description: Retrieves a specific income by ID for the authenticated user

put.description: Updates an existing income for the authenticated user

delete.description: Deletes an existing income for the authenticated user

post.description: Creates a new income for the authenticated user

get.description: Retrieves all financial products (deposits, cash accounts, indexed funds) for the authenticated user from the MI service
Search and filter recurring transactions for the authenticated user
Retrieves a specific recurring transaction by ID for the authenticated user

put.description: Updates an existing recurring transaction for the authenticated user

delete.description: Deletes an existing recurring transaction for the authenticated user

post.description: Creates a new recurring transaction for the authenticated user

get.description: Retrieves all tags for the authenticated user

post.description: Creates a new tag for the authenticated user

409.description: Tag with this ID already exists

get.description: Retrieves a specific tag by ID for the authenticated user

put.description: Updates an existing tag for the authenticated user

delete.description: Deletes an existing tag for the authenticated user
